text.__SUMMARY__: Aspergillus subversicolor is a species of fungus in the genus Aspergillus. It is from the Versicolores section. The species was first described in 2012.
text.Growth and morphology: A. subversicolor has been cultivated on both Czapek yeast extract agar (CYA) plates and Malt Extract Agar Oxoid® (MEAOX) plates. The growth morphology of the colonies can be seen in the pictures below.
